verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump ’s weekend foray to the G-7 summit] [V: was] [ARG2: a disaster on every level] . Trump arrived late . He left early . He slumped in halfway through a meeting on safeguarding the rights of women , and he skipped the sessions on the environment and climate ...
